item.title: Now
item.description: I get inspiration from this website to make Now page https://nownownow.com/about Currently I’m an intern at Korea Institute of Science and Technology. I’m sharing lessons about Startup School on medium

item.title: Me in 10 minutes
item.description: I was born and grew up in one of the best city in Turkey: İzmir. I wish to move there again one day in the future. I graduated with a Bachelors (2015) and a Masters (2018) in Control and Automation Engineering from Istanbul Technical University. I have various experiences. I started working while I was studying at university. Check my linkedin profile. I enjoy playing and watching soccer (fan of Beşiktaş), camping, hitchiking, dancing (Forro) and reading about tech. I’m a capoeirista. It is more than a hobby for me. If you don’t know what is it, check my blog post. I like to meet new people, travel new places and tasting foods-drinks. I always prefer new experiences.
